com.here.android.mpa.guidance

Class NavigationManager.TruckRestrictionListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.guidance.NavigationManager.TruckRestrictionListener
  • Enclosing class:
    NavigationManager

    public abstract static class NavigationManager.TruckRestrictionListener
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to retrieve violated truck restrictions while navigating.

    Callback will not be triggered if access to this operation is denied. Contact your HERE representative for more information.

        public TruckRestrictionListener()

    • Method Detail

      • onTruckRestriction

        @Deprecated
public void onTruckRestriction(@NonNull
                                           TruckRestrictionNotification notification)
        Deprecated. As of SDK 3.15. Use NavigationManager.TruckRestrictionListener.onTruckRestrictionAhead(TruckRestrictionNotification) instead.
        Callback to signal realtime notifications of truck restrictions during an active navigation session. Notification can be generated in two cases: 1) For routes that were calculated with RouteOptions.setTruckRestrictionsMode(PENALIZE_VIOLATIONS) option. Following routes can contain violated truck restrictions. In this case, a notification will warn that restrictions are on the current route ahead and property TruckRestrictionNotification.isOnRoute() for the notification will return true. 2) During rerouting, if the road in front contains violated truck restrictions. In this case, a notification will warn that rerouting is initialized by restrictions ahead and the property com.here.android.mpa.guidance.TruckRestrictionNotification#isOnRoute for the notification will return false.

        Note, callback will be triggered in about 200 meters before RoadElement with truck restriction.

        Parameters:
        notification - The truck restriction notification.

      • onTruckRestrictionAhead

        public void onTruckRestrictionAhead(@NonNull
                                    TruckRestrictionNotification notification)
        Callback to signal realtime notifications of truck restrictions during an active navigation session. Notification can be generated in two cases:
        • 1) For routes that were calculated with RouteOptions.setTruckRestrictionsMode(PENALIZE_VIOLATIONS) option. Following routes can contain violated truck restrictions. In this case, a notification will warn that restrictions are on the current route ahead and property TruckRestrictionNotification.isOnRoute() for the notification will return true.
        • 2) During rerouting, if the road in front contains violated truck restrictions. In this case, a notification will warn that rerouting is initialized by restrictions ahead and the property com.here.android.mpa.guidance.TruckRestrictionNotification#isOnRoute for the notification will return false.

        Note, callback will be triggered in about 200 meters before RoadElement with truck restriction. Use TruckRestrictionsInfo.getDistance() to get distance to particular truck restriction.

        Parameters:
        notification -

      • onTruckRestrictionUpdated

        public void onTruckRestrictionUpdated(@NonNull
                                      java.util.List<TruckRestriction> list)
        Callback to signal that truck restrictions were updated for the current road element.

        This callback is triggered in the following cases:

        • On entering truck restriction. In this case list of entered TruckRestriction are returned.
        • On active(entered) truck restriction change. It means either entrance to new truck restrictions or leaving some of current truck restrictions. In this case list of active truck restrictions are returned.
        • On leaving all truck restrictions. In this case empty list is returned.

        Parameters:
        list - The list of truck restriction.
